prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large translucent solid sacred head with unique fractal wave structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying sacred Fractal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating fractal wave, nested hexagonal patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Azure and light grey with metallic sheen inspired by spiritual fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns fused with yin-yang balanced tunics and taiji pattern sashes with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, incorporating cotton with circular patterns, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and fractal wave emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with Bagua mirror with sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor VIROOLI's profile: 'He who made the first nest', Aethyr ZOM, Water element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'In VIROOLI's presence, one feels held within a primordial sanctuary an inner sacred chamber built before any outer realm can be commanded.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent solid sacred head with unique fractal wave structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying sacred Fractal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating fractal wave, nested hexagonal patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns fused with yin-yang balanced tunics and taiji pattern sashes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, incorporating cotton with circular patterns
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with Bagua mirror
visual_elements.secondary_color: light grey with metallic sheen inspired by spiritual
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who made the first nest'
profile_data.essence: In VIROOLI's presence, one feels held within a primordial sanctuary an inner sacred chamber built before any outer realm can be commanded.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Primordial Sanctuary; marshals tideborn spirits.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal formation that shifts between liquid and solid states, representing the liminal boundary between potential and manifestation. Inspired by the Vesica Piscis sacred geometry, embodying the generative space between states of being.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Azure represents water's depth and spiritual insight, while silvery-white reflects Enochian celestial purity. The shifting pattern symbolizes water's transformative nature and the ZOM Aethyr's quantum flux.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Fractal waves represent infinite recursion of creation, while hexagonal structures mirror water's molecular sacred geometry. Phase-shifting motion embodies the Hermetic principle of 'as above, so below'.
